mapper.insert: insert into SA_OPROLE (SID, SNAME, SCODE, SCATALOG, SROLEKIND, SPARENTROLESNAMES, SDESCRIPTION, SSEQUENCE, SVALIDSTATE, VERSION) values (#{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scatalog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srolekind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sparentrolesnames,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssequence,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{svalidstate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update SA_OPROLE set SNAME = #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCODE = #{scode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCATALOG = #{scatalog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SROLEKIND = #{srolekind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPARENTROLESNAMES = #{sparentrolesnames,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SDESCRIPTION = #{sdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SSEQUENCE = #{ssequence,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SVALIDSTATE = #{svalidstate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SID, SNAME, SCODE, SCATALOG, SROLEKIND, SPARENTROLESNAMES, SDESCRIPTION, SSEQUENCE, SVALIDSTATE, VERSION from SA_OPROLE where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SID, SNAME, SCODE, SCATALOG, SROLEKIND, SPARENTROLESNAMES, SDESCRIPTION, SSEQUENCE, SVALIDSTATE, VERSION from SA_OPROLE
